projects.title: Greener Than You Think | ElleHacks 25'
projects.description: A friendly, cute web application as a comfort zone for adolescents. Want to have your own mini garden? Let your thoughts go? Then, Greener than you think is your to go! Made using HTML + CSS + JS.

projects.title: Screen Sage | GenAI 25'
projects.description: A simple, AI-powered tool that generates interview questions, scores responses, and gives feedback—helping candidates improve and aiding fairer hiring decisions.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Thats this! Designed a responsive portfolio site using React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. It features a clean layout, subtle animations, and an organized showcase of my projects and experience. Built with a focus on clarity, performance, and mobile-friendly design.

projects.title: Tetris | Assembly
projects.description: Implemented a simplified version of the classic Tetris game using MIPS assembly. Features real-time piece movement, rotation, collision detection, line clearing, and score tracking, all rendered on a memory-mapped framebuffer. Optimized low-level logic and display routines to handle game state updates efficiently on limited hardware.
